title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Zhang C (2024). ggehr: ggplot2 extension Electronic Health Records data. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/andreaczhang/ggehr.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ggehr: ggplot2 extension to Electronic Health Records data},   author = {Chi Zhang},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/andreaczhang/ggehr}, }

title: ggplot2 extension to Electronic Health Records data
text: ggehr (read: gg E-H-R) stands ggplot2 extension EHR data, provides set tools facilitate EHR (Electronic Health Records) visualization. ggehr package helps make visualize EHR data, can overview mixed type information related patient; visually identify errors data recording.

title: ggplot2 extension to Electronic Health Records data
text: Electronic Health Records (EHR) data patient records collected healthcare facilities hospitals clinics. Examples hospital EHR data include demographics, admission information well treatments (drugs, procedures). type data known messy prone error. principle data generated real-life contain time stamps; yet practice tend omit time information. comes EHR data essential keep time stamps, provide valuable information treatments procedures patients going . Broadly speaking, temporal data: treatments (drug, procedures, locations) static data: demographics, admission information EHR data usually scattered across different tables, beneficial collect altogether visualize one two graphs.  detailed example please see Get Started.

title: ggplot2 extension to Electronic Health Records data
text: package yet ready release. However wish, development version installed GitHub

title: AHUS antibiotics list — ab_ahus
text: dataset contains information antibiotics AHUS. details follow.

title: AHUS antibiotics list — ab_ahus
text: Antibiotic Name antibiotic Category Access, watch reserve Norsk_AHUS Norwegian name, AHUS hospital system color_code Color code according category

title: AHUS antibiotics list — ab_ahus
code: head(ab_ahus) #>                     Antibiotic Category                Norsk_AHUS color_code #>                         <char>   <char>                    <char>     <char> #> 1:                 Amoxicillin   Access              Amoksicillin      green #> 2: Amoxicillin/clavulanic-acid   Access Amoksicillin/Klavulansyre      green #> 3:                  Ampicillin   Access                Ampicillin      green #> 4:                Azithromycin    Watch               Azitromycin     yellow #> 5:                   Aztreonam  Reserve                 Aztreonam        red #> 6:            Benzylpenicillin   Access          Benzylpenicillin      green
